name: Inpulsa (Robsen)
description:
Traver is 21 years old and lives a normal life as an art student in Frankfurt. 

However, he has a problem which haunts him again and again. 

His panic attacks. 

In Inpulsa, Traver has a panic attack in a mall. 

Your task is to find people and objects to calm Traver down and help him deal with this unpleasant situation. 

Will you manage to defeat his demons or will Traver pass out from the pressure?
